comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Henry P. Fletcher was the U.S. Minister, later Ambassador, to Chile from 1910 to 1916. Luis Izquierdo and Augusto Villanueva were the former Chilean Foreign Minister and Director General of the Bank of Chile, respectively, in New York en route to the Pan American Financial Conference on May 24, 1915 in Washington. books.google.com/books?id=AgQRAAAAYAAJ&pg=PA102&l... The man on the right is Willard D. Straight (January 31, 1880 – December 1, 1918). He was an American investment banker, publisher, reporter and diplomat and a member of a committee in May, 1915, headed by Ambassador Fletcher to meet and entertain the delagates to the conference. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F70D1EFB395B17... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Willard_Dickerman_Straight
